ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll RP UnderT s alliance chars untill he gets back. ... Zardus nods as he recieves Marine s message. He stands up and lifts his comm-link to his mouth.

Subject: Neo Beast Wars

From: Yanshosh@...

I'll RP UnderT's alliance chars untill he gets back.

::Zardus/Prowl::

Zardus nods as he recieves Marine's message. He stands up and lifts his comm-link to his mouth.

"Reptilica, Bloodystrike, follow me to the predacon base. Zergling, patroll the perimiter. No one non-alliance is to get through."

He walks to the exit of the alliance base. Reptilica and Bloodystrike walk up to him, weapons ready. "Who're we gonna kill?"

Zardus looks at the two bots. "The predacon base is being attacked by the new predacons. We're allied with them, so we will help them for now," He says and flies off.

The two bots fly off after him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl's breathing quickens considerably as Iron Raptor moves in his arms.

He looks at her and notices that she is tightly holding on to him. Somehow, that realization made his feel very good, and he barely sees Shockers shot before Tritan jumps in front of him.

Prowl folds his wings, diving toward the ground at an alarming rate to escape further shots.

Several yards off of the ground, he opens his wings, catches a thermal, and he and Iron Raptor suddenly fly up and forward, heading for Shocker, Prowl firing at him.
